_comment: Rosso Premium Lettuce (Red/Purple Leaf) - Lactuca sativa var. crispa
_source: Optimized for red pigment development and tender leaves

variety.name: Rosso Premium
characteristics: Requires more light for color development

temperature.notes: Rosso tolerates slightly warmer temps, prefers 20-24°C for color development

humidity.notes: Lower humidity than green varieties, reduces disease risk

ec.notes: Higher EC for intense color and flavor

light.notes: Higher light intensity for red pigment development (anthocyanins)

adjustments.notes: Higher K and Fe for color development

preventive_actions.high_temperature: Increase ventilation, reduce light intensity if >26°C, mist canopy in afternoon
preventive_actions.low_temperature: Reduce ventilation, increase heating, avoid cold water in morning
preventive_actions.high_humidity: Increase air circulation, run dehumidifier, space plants wider
preventive_actions.low_humidity: Reduce ventilation rate, add humidifier, mist lightly
preventive_actions.high_ph: Add pH down (phosphoric acid) slowly - 1ml per 10L, retest in 30min
preventive_actions.low_ph: Add pH up (potassium hydroxide) slowly - 0.5ml per 10L, retest in 30min
preventive_actions.high_ec: Dilute with fresh water, drain 25% and refill with lower EC solution
preventive_actions.low_ec: Add nutrient concentrate gradually, target 1.6-1.8 mS/cm for mature plants
preventive_actions.low_light: Check timer, clean fixtures, verify LED functionality, reduce canopy density

harvest.post_harvest: Rinse in cold water, dry gently, refrigerate at 4°C
